channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- PowerLogic P5
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- PowerLogic P5

item.title: CVE-2024-5559|2024-06-12T17:18:04.604Z -- schneider%20electric -- powerlogic%20p5
item.description: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service, device reboot, or an attacker gaining full control of the relay when a specially crafted reset token is entered into the front panel of the device.
